## Usage 

 Click on the navigation tree to open the docs

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier

{"description":"`furo-fbp`

 Custom element to create an instant web component and allow using furo-fbp's  features.

 You can use the component anywhere in your html or in other components.

 Keep in mind that the component is encapsulated.

```html

 <!-- Use them even before the definition -->
 <my-component></my-component>
 <other-component></other-component>

   <!-- define the component -->
   <furo-fbp name="my-component">
     <template>
       <button @-click="--btnClicked" ƒ-remove="--btnClicked">sender</button>
     </template>
   </furo-fbp>
```
 ## Attributes
 ### **name** (string)

 Set the name of the component to generate, must be a valid web-component name and unique. The name is MANDATORY.

 ### **expose** (string)
 Define methods that you want to expose as comma separated string.

 *example*

 `expose="delete,removeAll"`
  - delete will trigger the wire `|--delete`
  - removeAll will trigger the wire `|--removeAll`","summary":"instant web component with fbp","path":"src/furo-fbp.js","properties":[],"methods":[{"name":"firstUpdated","description":"Auto append fbp for lit elements","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":46,"column":4},"end":{"line":54,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"},"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"_FBPTriggerWire","description":"Triggers a wire","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":62,"column":4},"end":{"line":108,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"wire","description":"(String) Name of the wire like --buttonClicked"},{"name":"detailData","description":"(*) data to pass"}],"return":{"type":"void"},"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"_FBPAddWireHook","description":"","privacy":"protected","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":118,"column":4},"end":{"line":131,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"wire","description":"(String) Name of the wire"},{"name":"cb","description":"(function) Callback function cb(detailData)"},{"name":"before"}],"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"_FBPTraceWires","description":"Log all triggered wires for this component. This function may help you at debugging.
Select your element in the dev console and call `$0._FBPTraceWires()`","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":140,"column":4},"end":{"line":190,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"},"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"_FBPDebug","description":"Get information for the triggered wire. This function may help you at debugging.
Select your element in the dev console and call `$0._FBPDebug('--dataReceived')`","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":200,"column":4},"end":{"line":249,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"wire"},{"name":"openDebugger","description":"opens the debugger console, so you can inspect your component."}],"return":{"type":"void"},"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"__toCamelCase","description":"eslint-disable-next-line class-methods-use-this","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":252,"column":4},"end":{"line":254,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"str"}],"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"_appendFBP","description":"parses the dom for flowbased programming tags","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"file":"fbp.js","start":{"line":261,"column":4},"end":{"line":537,"column":5}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"dom","description":"dom node"}],"return":{"type":"void"},"inheritedFrom":"FBP"},{"name":"_FBPReady","description":"Livecycle method
